original_text: Neither of them had the money to pay him back, so he forgave the debts of both. Now which of them will love him more?”
korean_text: 갚을 것이 없으므로 둘 다 탕감하여 주었으니 둘 중에 누가 그를 더 사랑하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Neither of them had the money
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 어느 누구도 돈이 없었으니

sentences.original_text: so he forgave the debts of both
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그가 둘의 빚을 탕감해 주었느니라
